AP: Initialization Check in Initialization Procedure of Data Pool Component
DefValue: Return 'success' if there are adequate resources for creating the data structures for the data items

AP: Initialization Action in Initialization Procedure of Data Pool Component
DefValue: Create the data structures required for the data items and return 'success' if creation was successful

AP: Configuration Check in Reset Procedure of Data Pool Component
DefValue: Return 'success' if current values of data items can be initialized with their default values in zero logical execution time or else return 'success' if initialization of current value of data items has completed

AP: Configuration Action in Reset Procedure of Data Pool Component
DefValue: Start initialization of current values of data items with their default values and return 'success' if the initialization has completed

AP: Shutdown Action of Data Pool Component
DefValue: Same value as in Base Component

AP: Execution Procedure of Data Pool Component
DefValue: Refresh values of debug variables in data pool

AP: Definition of Data Items in the Data Pool Component
DefValue: No default defined at framework level

AP: Operation to access the Current Value of a Data Item
DefValue: No default defined at framework level

AP: Operation to update the Current Value of a Data Item
DefValue: No default defined at framework level

AP: Initialization Check in Initialization Procedure of OutComponent
DefValue: Always returns 'check successful'

AP: Initialization Action in Initialization Procedure of OutComponent
DefValue: Do nothing and return 'action successful'

AP: Configuration Check in Reset Procedure of OutComponent
DefValue: Always returns 'check successful'

AP: Configuration Action in Reset Procedure of OutComponent
DefValue: Do nothing and return 'action successful'

AP: Shutdown Action in Base Component of OutComponent
DefValue: Do nothing

AP: Execution Procedure of OutComponent
DefValue: Do nothing

AP: Service Type Attribute of OutComponent
DefValue: Set equal to PUS service type

AP: Command/Report Sub-Type Attribute of OutComponent
DefValue: Set equal to PUS service sub-type

AP: Destination Attribute of OutComponent
DefValue: See definition of individual reports

AP: Acknowledge Level Attribute of OutComponent
DefValue: Not relevant to out-going report

AP: Discriminant Attribute of OutComponent
DefValue: See definition of individual reports

AP: Parameter Attribute of OutComponent
DefValue: See definition of individual reports

AP: Enable Check Operation of OutComponent
DefValue: See definition of individual reports

AP: Ready Check Operation of OutComponent
DefValue: See definition of individual reports

AP: Repeat Check Operation of OutComponent
DefValue: See definition of individual reports

AP: Update Action of OutComponent
DefValue: See definition of individual reports

AP: Serialize Operation of OutComponent
DefValue: Build a packet with the layout specified by the PUS

AP: Operation to Report Invalid Destination of an OutComponent
DefValue: Generate SNDPCKT\_INV\_DEST Error Report

AP: Initialization Check in Initialization Procedure of InCommand
DefValue: Returns 'check successful' if information for initializing InCommand using data in incoming packet is valid

AP: Initialization Action in Initialization Procedure of InCommand
DefValue: Use information in incoming packet to initialize InCommand and return “action successful'

AP: Configuration Check in Reset Procedure of InCommand
DefValue: Returns 'check successful' if packet length and checksum are correct

AP: Configuration Action in Reset Procedure of InCommand
DefValue: Use information in incoming packet to configure InCommand and return “action successful'

AP: Shutdown Action of InCommand
DefValue: Release all resources allocated to the InCommand

AP: Execution Procedure of InCommand
DefValue: Do nothing

AP: Ready Check of InCommand
DefValue: See definition of individual commands

AP: Start Action of InCommand
DefValue: See definition of individual commands

AP: Progress Action of InCommand
DefValue: See definition of individual commands

AP: Termination Action of InCommand
DefValue: See definition of individual commands

AP: Abort Action of InCommand
DefValue: See definition of individual commands

AP: Operation to Report Start Failed for InCommand
DefValue: See definition of service 1

AP: Operation to Report Start Successful for InCommand
DefValue: See definition of service 1

AP: Operation to Report Progress Failed for InCommand
DefValue: See definition of service 1

AP: Operation to Report Progress Successful for InCommand
DefValue: See definition of service 1

AP: Operation to Report Termination Failed for InCommand
DefValue: See definition of service 1

AP: Operation to Report Report Termination Successful for InCommand
DefValue: See definition of service 1

AP: Service Type Attribute of InCommand
DefValue: Set equal to PUS service type

AP: Command Sub-Type Attribute of InCommand
DefValue: Set equal to PUS service sub-type

AP: Discriminant Attribute of InCommand
DefValue: See definition of individual commands

AP: Parameter Attributes of InCommand
DefValue: See definition of individual commands

AP: Operation to Report Packet Destination Invalid by InLoader
DefValue: Run the Packet Re-Routing Failure Procedure of figure \ref{fig:PcktReroutingFail}

AP: Operation to Report Acceptance Failure by InLoader
DefValue: Run the Packet Acceptance Failure Procedure of figure \ref{fig:PcktAccFail}

AP: Operation to Report Acceptance Success by InLoader
DefValue: Run the Command Verification Success Procedure of figure \ref{fig:CmdVerSucc}

AP: Operation to Report Start Failed for InCommand
DefValue: Run the Command Verification Failure Procedure of figure \ref{fig:CmdVerFail}

AP: Operation to Report Start Successful for InCommand
DefValue: Run the Command Verification Success Procedure of figure \ref{fig:CmdPrgrSucc}

AP: Operation to Report Progress Failed for InCommand
DefValue: Run the Command Progress Failure Procedure \ref{fig:CmdPrgrFail}

AP: Operation to Report Progress Successful for InCommand
DefValue: Determine if a progress step has been completed and, if so, run the Command Progress Success Procedure

AP: Operation to Report Termination Failed for InCommand
DefValue: Run the Command Verification Failure Procedure of figure \ref{fig:CmdVerSucc}

AP: Operation to Report Report Termination Successful for InCommand
DefValue: Run the Command Verification Success Procedure of figure \ref{fig:CmdPrgrSucc}

AP: Definition of Parameter Monitoring Procedures
DefValue: Three parameter monitoring procedures are defined (limit check, expected value and delta check)

AP: Definition of Parameter Monitoring Definition List (PMDL)
DefValue: By default, all parameter monitors are empty

AP: Definition of Functional Monitoring Definition List (FMDL)
DefValue: By default, all parameter monitors are empty

AP: Operation to access the i-th LPT Buffer
DefValue: No default defined at framework level
